entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 09 January 2023
